text: Andrzej Kopiczyński (15 April 1934 - 13 October 2016) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 50 movies and television between 1958 and 2016. He was known for his starring role as Stefan Karwowski in the comedy series Czterdziestolatek (1974-1977). Kopiczyński was born in Międzyrzec Podlaski, Poland. Kopiczyński died in Warsaw on 13 October 2016 of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 82.ANDRZEJ KOPICZYŃSKI NIE ŻYJE ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Poland Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Andrzej Kopiczyński
